member.name: M:CrystalDecisions.CrystalReports.Engine.ReportDocument.Load(System.String,CrystalDecisions.Shared.OpenReportMethod)

summary.para: Loads a new report and sets the OpenReportMethod enumeration. If a report is already loaded, then it is closed and a new one is opened.

member.param: Indicates the path and filename of the report.
Indicates if the report is to be opened as a temporary copy or by default.

summary.para: Loads a new report. If a report is already loaded, then it is closed and a new one is opened.

param.name: filename
param.para: Indicates the path and filename of the report.

summary.para: Opens a subreport contained in the report and returns a ReportDocument object corresponding to the named subreport.

returns.para: Returns a separate ReportDocument that represents the subreport.

summary.para: Prints the specified pages of the report to the printer selected using the PrintOptions.PrinterName property. If no printer is selected, the default printer specified in the report will be used.

param.name: nCopies
param.para: Indicates the number of copies to print.

param.name: collated
param.para: Indicates whether to collate the pages.

param.name: startPageN
param.para: Indicates the first page to print.

param.name: endPageN
param.para: Indicates the last page to print.

summary.para: Saves the report into the specified file.

param.name: filename

param.name: cssClass
param.para: The name of the style class as defined in the style sheet.
